idea-plugin.name: Code Style Sync
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin generating the .codeStyles folder in the top level of your project
Add any code style file to this folder to sync it automatically with your IntelliJ based IDE Share the code style through git among your team and when updated in the repository your team automatically will sync with the new code style.

The plugin doesn't take care of automatically formatting your project's files after replacing the new code style
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version: 1.0
Release of the initial version of the Code Style plugin

action.description: Find code style folder within project top level folder and sync code style files with Android Studio
